constituent: cottage, umbrella, earthenware jar, lidded crock, soil, dirt, ground, mouth
heisigStory: A lidded crock with an umbrella overhead gives us a mixture of the modern and the nostalgic in this design for a cottage.
koohiiStory1: The cottage is so small - it has an umbrella for the roof; soil for the floor and room for only one mouth.
koohiiStory2: My vacation cottage is nothing but a hole in the ground covered by an umbrella.
myStory: nhà nghỉ. nhà với mái trên đất cho miệng ăn.
words:
校舎(こうしゃ): school building
田舎(いなか): the country, country side
